name: blench
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to move back or away suddenly or react physically because something frightens, disgusts (= shocks), or upsets you: At the sight of the dead animal, Diana blenched.
humorous to be very unwilling to do something: My sister blenches at the very thought of changing a baby's nappy.
